branchCategory.name: Remote
branchCategory.description: <p>Pneumatic sensors to be installed out of view, with analog outputs for a sensor monitor or the HMI.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE530 Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, General Purpose, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>PSE530 and 532 are remote pressure sensors with a 1 to 5V analog signal output.  530 is for a standard pneumatic system's pressure range, while the 532 model is for low pressure.  PSE sensors measure pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  An accuracy of ±2% of the full scale rated pressure range is suitable for general purpose applications.  The cable is replaceable, with a locking thread relief.  PSE530 and PSE532 are CE and RoHS compliant, with IP40 enclosure ratings.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE540 Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Compact, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>PSE540 is a remote pressure sensor with a 1 to 5V analog signal output.  This sensor's construction optimizes space savings, for tight, constrained spaces.  The rated pressure range is suitable for a standard pneumatic system.  PSE sensors can measure pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  8 different port options offer tremendous adaptability to various applications.  The cable is molded into the sensor head and is not replaceable.  PSE540 is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE550 Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Low Differential Pressure
branchItem.description: <p>PSE550 is a remote sensor for measuring small differences in pressure between two sources.  The sensor can function in small vacuum and positive pressure applications, detecting differential pressure from 0-2 kPa, within a -50 to 50 kPa range.  PSE sensors can measure pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  Pipe connections are made with ø4mm I.D. pneumatic tubing.  An orange LED indicates the sensor is on.  The sensor can be direct mounted, or mounted on an optional bracket.  PSE550 is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE300, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, Switch and Analog Outputs
branchItem.description: <p>PSE300 is a pressure sensor monitor with a 3 + 1/2 digit, 2 color display.&nbsp; This monitor pairs with any PSE sensor, adding functionality similar to an ISE sensor with integrated display.&nbsp; Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition. Two available switch outputs are also indicated with LEDs.&nbsp; Other functions permit calibration, peak/bottom readings, error indications, key lock, and anti-chatter.&nbsp; PSE300 models are UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The PSE300 legacy sensor monitor has been updated.&nbsp; Please consider the new PSE300AC.&nbsp; Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display, front facing M12 connections, selectable NPN/PNP outputs, and an IP65 enclosure rating.</span></p>

branchItem.name: PSE300AC, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 3 Screen, 2 Outputs, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>PSE300AC is a remote sensor monitor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen 3 color display.  While primarily suited for the PSE570 pressure sensor series, its range input function scales the analog output of any sensor with M12 connector.  View the sensor's measured value on the main screen, while also viewing a variety of secondary data on the sub-screens.  Upgraded features include front facing M12 power and sensor connections, low energy consumption, and selectable NPN/PNP outputs.  PSE300AC is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE200, Multi-Channel Pressure Sensor Monitor, 1 Screen, 5 Outputs
branchItem.description: <p>PSE200 is a pressure sensor monitor with a 4 digit, 1 color display able to manage up to 4 PSE sensors.  The value of any sensor can be selected for display, with an LED indicator showing the channel chosen.  Switch outputs with LED indicators are available for each channel, with 2 outputs for channel 1.  Multiple functions are availabe to optimize the display, switch set points, and security.  PSE200 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 front face rating when panel mounted.</p>

branchItem.name: PSE200/300, Power Supply/Output Connection Cable
branchItem.description: <p>Power supply connection cable for series PSE200/300 pressure sensor controllers.</p>
